title: America's global image under Biden skyrockets compared to Trump, survey finds
content:
1. America's global image under Biden skyrockets compared to Trump, survey finds  NBC News
  2. The end of Trump's presidency brought the US one of its biggest spikes in global approval ratings on record  Yahoo News
  3. Global approval of the United States has rebounded under Biden, survey finds  The Washington Post
  4. Why does Joe Biden feel the need to tell people in other countries what to do, even when he can't get Americans to obey him?  RT
  5. Thursday's Mini-Report, 6.10.21  MSNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
America's global image under Biden skyrockets compared to Trump, survey finds  NBC News
The end of Trump's presidency brought the US one of its biggest spikes in global approval ratings on record  Yahoo News
Global approval of the United States has rebounded under Biden, survey finds  The Washington Post
Why does Joe Biden feel the need to tell people in other countries what to do, even when he can't get Americans to obey him?  RT

localize.title: バイデン政権下のアメリカのグローバルイメージは、トランプ政権下に比べて急上昇していることが調査で判明
调查显示，与特朗普相比，拜登领导下的美国的全球形象直线上升
調查顯示，與特朗普相比，拜登領導下的美國的全球形象直線上升
